title: ZipRecruiter Job Scraper
description: Scrape jobs from ZipRecruiter.com. Provide either keyword/location OR a ZipRecruiter.com search URL (startUrl, url, or startUrls). Actor paginates and optionally scrapes detail pages.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific ZipRecruiter.com search URL. If provided, this will be used instead of Keyword/Location.

keyword.title: Keyword (if not using Start URL)
keyword.description: Job search keyword(s), e.g., 'Software Engineer', 'Data Analyst', 'Manager'.

location.title: Location (if not using Start URL)
location.description: Location to search for jobs (e.g., 'San Francisco', 'New York', 'Remote'). Leave empty for all locations.

postedWithin.title: Jobs posted within
postedWithin.description: Only keep jobs posted within this time window.

collectDetails.title: Collect job details
collectDetails.description: Legacy toggle (kept for backwards compatibility). Prefer `detail_mode` for finer control.

detail_mode.title: Detail mode
detail_mode.description: Controls how many job detail pages are fetched. `basic` fetches only a few per page for speed/cost savings.

max_detail_concurrency.title: Max detail concurrency
max_detail_concurrency.description: Maximum parallel detail requests (1-8). Higher is faster but increases blocking risk and proxy cost.

detail_playwright_fallback.title: Playwright fallback for details
detail_playwright_fallback.description: If enabled, uses a stealth Playwright page as a fallback for detail pages blocked over HTTP (slower/more expensive).

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of jobs
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of jobs to collect. Leave empty to collect all available jobs.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: A safety cap on the number of search result pages to visit.

listing_fetch_retries.title: Listing fetch retries
listing_fetch_retries.description: Number of retries (with backoff) for listing requests.

detail_fetch_retries.title: Detail fetch retries
detail_fetch_retries.description: Number of retries (with backoff) for detail requests.

handshake_mode.title: Playwright handshake mode
handshake_mode.description: Controls whether the actor launches Playwright for a 1-page handshake. Use `auto` to avoid browser startup unless blocked/empty.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy (RESIDENTIAL recommended for ZipRecruiter.com).
